name: Weird Phenomenon
description:
The hoomanz have found your location and are sending hordes of soldiers to destroy you. Go out with a bang.

Totem

Totem is an indiedev collective that allows creators to collaborate. Six phenomena types can be acquired for this game through the Totem Explorer and used in all of the games in the Totem ecosystem.

Controls
  • [Space] - start playing
  • [←][→] - move
Features
  • Six phenomena types
  • Score-based arcade
  • Hordes of humans
  • Weird physics

Created in 72 hours in the Totem New Year's Jam 2023
